channel.title: AGK Library
channel.description: How often in C++ is the app game kit library used? Is it worth learning? My c++ class is up but I still have half the book to read through. The other half is all about AGK and developing apps. Is it worth looking into this, or is there something more common to learn?

item.title: AGK Library
item.dc:creator: @Xellium Xellium
item.description:
@Xellium wrote:

How often in C++ is the app game kit library used? Is it worth learning? My c++ class is up but I still have half the book to read through. The other half is all about AGK and developing apps. Is it worth looking into this, or is there something more common to learn?
